section.p: The Procedure Findings Section records clinically significant observations confirmed or discovered during a procedure or surgery.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-8078, CONF:1198-10443, CONF:1198-32537 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.28"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Procedure Findings Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.28)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15417)/@code="59776-5" Procedure Findings (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15418, CONF:1198-30859)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-8090, CONF:1198-15507)
Conforms to Problem Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4:2015-08-01)
SHALL conform to Procedure Findings Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.28)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15417)/@code="59776-5" Procedure Findings (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15418, CONF:1198-30859)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:8080, R2.1=CONF:1198-8080)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:8081, R2.1=CONF:1198-8081)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-8090, CONF:1198-15507)
Conforms to Problem Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4:2015-08-01)

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8078 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.28"
